Description:
This motel features free Wi-Fi and a patio area with barbecue facilities. The motel is 3 km from the Radium Hot Spring Pools.

Refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, and cable TV with flat 42" LCD screens are standard in all rooms at the Crystal Springs Motel. The rooms offer new beds and upgraded wood furnishings.

This motel features air conditioning and heating.

The Crystal Springs Motel is 35 km to the Panorama Ski Resort. Windermere Lake is within a 20-minute drive of the property. Description:
Situated in the centre of Mississauga, 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Prime Location in Mississauga has a fitness centre, a garden, free WiFi, and free private parking for guests who drive. Set 10 km from Mississauga Convention Centre, the property features barbecue facilities.

Providing access to a balcony with city views, the air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Languages spoken at the reception include Arabic, English, Hindi and Urdu.

The wellness area at the apartment is comprised of a sauna and a hot tub. Guests can enjoy the indoor pool at 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Prime Location in Mississauga.

BMO Field is 24 km from the accommodation, while Budweiser Stage is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Toronto Pearson International Airport, 10 km from 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Prime Location in Mississauga.

Description:
Located on Highway 97, this Chetwynd motel offers a cable TV in each room.  Free Wi-Fi is offered in all areas.  The Prairie Heritage Museum is 10 minutes drive away.

Mountain views are provided from all rooms at Chetwynd Court Motel.  Every simply furnished room includes a desk and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries.  Select rooms feature kitchen facilities.

A coin operated launderette is available for guests of Motel Chetwynd Court.  Air-conditioning provides added comfort.

Peace Canyon Dam is 50 minutes drive away.  Dawson Creek is 100 km from this motel. You must show a valid photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all special requests cannot be guaranteed and are subject to availability upon check-in. Additional charges may apply.

Description:
Overlooking Lake Ontario, this B&B offers on-site beach access. Victoria Park Beach is 1 minute walk away. An on-site patio is available as well as free Wi-Fi in all rooms.

A suite at Willowmere boasts a private entrance and patio with lake views. A sitting room with sofa and TV is provided, as well as an en suite bathroom.

Decorated with antiques and eclectic art, Willowmere offers a non-smoking environment. A hot breakfast is also available to guests with surcharge.

Cobourg city centre, with its specialty shops and restaurants, is just 15 minutes walk away. Port Hope is about 13 km away from this waterfront B&B. HotelName: Sun Peaks Resort - Sun Peaks Lodge
Address: 3180 Creekside Way Sun PeaksBritish Columbia V0E 5N0
Description:
This traditional hotel is a ski-in/ski-out property located in the middle of Sun Peaks Resort in Sun Peaks, British Columbia. It is steps away from chair elevators and hiking/biking trails. Free WiFi is available in all guest rooms.

The guest rooms and studios at Sun Peaks Lodge are equipped with a flat-screen TV, seating area, phone and windows which can be opened. A refrigerator, coffee maker with free coffee and a kettle with tea are provided for guest convenience. All rooms feature bathrooms with walk-in showers. Studios are located in the adjacent building and additionally offer a kitchenette.

The Steakhouse Restaurant and Bar, (open in the winter only) offers steak and seafood dishes along with an extensive wine list.

McSporties Ski Rental Shop is part of the Sun Peaks Lodge. Concierge services are offered. Ski equipment can be stored free in the storage room, a tuning bench and boot dryer are available. In the winter months, guests can relax in the hot tub, steam room or the sauna.

The Sun Peaks Resort Golf Course is a 2 minute walk away. Please inform Sun Peaks Lodge in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
Steakhouse is closed from Mon 03 Apr 2023 until Tue 16 May 2023
Steakhouse is closed from Fri 29 Sept 2023 until Sun 10 Dec 2023
Fondue Stube-Winter only is closed from Sun 02 Apr 2023 until Mon 11 Dec 2023
A damage deposit of CAD 100 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
Located at the bottom of Shefford Mountain in Shefford, Québec, Solaireau Spa features a full-service spa and wellness centre. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Guest rooms at Spa Solaireau B&B include a private bathroom.

A healthy, vegetarian breakfast is served every morning. The majority of ingredients used are organic. This bed and breakfast also offers a range of relaxation facilities, including a hammam, hot spring bath and hot tub with a mountain view. Massages are available at a cost.

Montréal is 90 km away. Ski Bromont is 11 km from this property and Granby Zoo is 21 km away. The hiking trails of Jean-Paul Forand Park are right next door and LEstriade cycling trail is 5 km away.

Situated in Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupré in the Quebec region and Sainte Anne de Beaupre Basilica reachable within 10 km, Les Chalets Rassembleurs features accommodation with free WiFi, BBQ facilities, a garden and free private parking. The accommodation is air conditioned and has a hot tub.

The chalet provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Les Chalets Rassembleurs offers a hot tub.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy billiards on site, or go hiking or skiing in the surroundings.

A damage deposit of CAD 500 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Located in the heart of Banff National Park and less than 10 minutes walk from Banff town center, YWCA Banff Hotel sits along the peaceful Bow River.

In addition to striving to offer the best value for private room accommodation in Banff, YWCA Banff is a social enterprise hotel. This means that by booking a stay with us, guests are investing their vacation dollars into social services that empower local women and their communities for a better future.

Rooms, which are basic in nature, do not include televisions, air-conditioning, or mini-fridges. This is part of the design to offering guests such an affordable option for accessing Banff. The property does offer 24-hour reception, guest laundry facilities, free wifi, and limited first come first serviced on-site parking. Description:
Located in Canmore in the Alberta region, Fenwick Vacation Rentals Suites with Pool & Hot tubs provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. The accommodation features a hot tub.

Offering mountain or pool views, each unit comes with a kitchen, a cable flat-screen TV and game console, wardrobe, a washing machine and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A fridge, a dishwasher and oven are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

The Whyte Museum of the Canadian Rockies is 27 km from the aparthotel, while Banff Park Museum is 27 km away. The nearest airport is Calgary International Airport, 112 km from Fenwick Vacation Rentals Suites with Pool & Hot tubs. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of CAD 300 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
This city hotel is perfectly located just a few steps from the Royal B.C. Museum and Victoria's beautiful Inner Harbour. Shopping, bars, nightlife, attractions and restaurants are all within walking distance. The bus, train and underground stations are also in the vicinity.

The 146 room, 9-storey property is the only Victoria hotel surrounded by parks. It was renovated in 2008 and has lots to offer for all kinds of visitors, including a wide variety of stylish rooms. The hotel is the perfect place for any traveller, regardless of their reason for being in town. It has a lobby, 24-hour reception and check-out service, a hotel safe, currency exchange facility, lift access, an attractive restaurant, and room and laundry services. Parking facilities are available to guests arriving by car.

All rooms feature a coffee maker, iron and ironing board, complimentary high-speed Internet access, and a balcony. The spacious standard rooms feature a king- or queen-size beds and seating areas. Some rooms offer a fully equipped kitchen. An en suite bathroom, hairdryer, direct dial telephone, satellite TV, radio, washing machine and individually regulated air conditioning are also provided.

The hotel features a Mediterranean-style indoor pool and a new gym facility. A hot tub and a sauna are also provided.

The hotel has an attractive restaurant.

Located in Lac-Brome, Chalets et Suites Lac Brome offers an outdoor pool and access to a public beach less than 4 km away. Free WiFi access is available.

A cable TV, sofa and balcony are offered in each room. Access to an outdoor dining area and barbecue is also included.

A garden and terrace are some of the shared facilities at Chalets et Suites Lac Brome. Guests can also enjoy outdoor activities like fishing, canoeing and kayaking on the lake.

Granby Zoo is 27 minutes drive away, and Ski Bromont is 16 minutes drive away. The Brome County Historical Society is an 8-minute drive from Chalets et Suites Lac Brome. Description:
Offering 2 private beaches, Wya Point Resort is located on an old First Nations village site 7 minutes away from Ucluelet city centre and Pacific Rim National Park.

In each chalet, expansive balconies overlook the Pacific Ocean and offer BBQ facilities and outdoor seating are enjoyed. A full kitchen is provided. A fireplace features in the West Coast inspired living rooms at Wya Point Resort chalets. Private bathrooms offer free toiletries. Free WiFi is available.

Guests can enjoy surfing and hiking on the beaches of the surrounding coastal rainforest.

Long Beach is 12 km and Kennedy Lake is 8 km from these chalet resorts. Tofino Airport is 22 minutes away. Please note that the check-in and key-collection take place at: 2695 Tofino-Ucluelet Highway, V0R 3A0 Ucluelet, BC.

Description:
The award winning Eco-Lodge is an off-grid wilderness lodge deep in the forests of Algonquin Park.  Nestled on the shores of a private lake and a cascading waterfall, the Eco-Lodge creates all its electricity from micro-hydro generators. Situated amidst natural surroundings, various hiking trails, Algonquin Eco-Lodge features a hot tub and wood-burning sauna. Generating electricity from the lake and waterfall, the simple accommodation shares an external bathroom.

Each of the rooms is fitted with pine wood walls and furnishings. It is also equipped with a window. Linens and towels are not provided.

Every day the property prepares a set meal menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner, which are served at specific times throughout the day. There is an additional cost for dietary requests.

The main building at Algonquin Eco-Lodge consists of shared bathrooms with showers, a communal lounge and dining area. Various activities, such as horseback riding, cross country skiing and canoe trips can be arranged.

Free parking is located within a 25-minute walk away. Luggage can be transferred upon request with surcharge. It is 30 km from Algonquin Park and an hours drive from the nearest visitor information centre. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please note that the parking area is within a 25-minute walk from the property. Transfer of luggage to and from the property can be arranged upon request with surcharge. Please contact the property for further information.

Please note that there is no service for internet and cellular phone.

Shoes are not permitted inside the lodge. Guests are requested to bring slippers.

Please note that towels are not provided.

Guests are requested to bring sleeping bags during the winter months. Linens are provided during the summer months.

Description:
Nestled in the beautiful Basque countryside, this enchanting castle has been converted into a charming boutique hotel with a fine restaurant and a tower overlooking the surrounding vineyards.

Stay in your very own magic castle this holiday. The Hotel Castillo El Collado dates back to the 1900s and its decor is designed to help you escape into your fairytale. The boutique hotel has 10 rooms, each decorated distinctly - balancing original features with fabulous details.

Beds may be decorated with canopies and heaters have been brought over from the old movie sets of Diana Logrono.

Located in the walled village of Laguardia-Rioja Alavesa, you can circle the site on the footpath and admire views over the Sierra de Cantabria. Climb the tower of the Collado Castle to enjoy views from a privileged position and with a glass of the hotels wine.

Dine in the lounge and dining room of the Collado Castle. Carefully prepared recipes are beautifully presented and source fresh, local produce.

The hotel is ideally located for visiting nearby cities, including Mérida. Just a 20-minute drive away, this historic city is known for its Roman ruins. Caceres is just over an hours drive away.

The hotels popular restaurant offers regional gastronomy and avant-garde cuisine. Gluten-free dishes are available on prior request. You can enjoy drinks and a barbecue on the large outdoor terrace in summer. Room service is also available 24 hours a day.

Description:
OKU Ibiza is a Balearic retreat in its simplest form. Located on the South West of the island, just moments from the beautiful Cala Gracio bay, OKU Ibiza is both vibrant and tranquil, reflecting the spirit of the White Isle itself.
The bohemian setting brings the outdoors in, with the island's largest swimming pool, plus and a second pool offering the space and seclusion for guests to unwind.
Showcasing the best of local culture, OKU Ibiza invites guests to savour delectable fusion cuisine with the destination OKU Restaurant, sip a freshly shaken cocktail at the pool or restore mind and body in the spa and wellness areas.
Our soulful Ibizan hideaway invites you to discover your inner space, whatever that means to you.

Description: Offering a barbecue and views of the garden, Villanoelia Beach No fiestas is located in Cambrils, 3 km from Salou and 5 km from Port Aventura. Free WiFi is available. The house has 3 bedrooms, a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. There is a bathroom with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Tarragona is 20 km from Villanoelia Beach No fiestas, while La Pineda is 8 km away. The nearest airport is Reus Airport, 13 km from Villanoelia Beach No fiestas. Cambrils is 2.7 km from the property. Please inform Villanoelia Beach No fiestas in advance of your expected arrival time. Please note that a cat lives in the accommodation and it is not recommended for guests with allergies. It is my home for the whole year, so you have all kinds of comforts and utensils. I leave you beach umbrellas, beach cooler and beach towels. The beach is 400m away and Port Aventura is 3km away. There is an excellent SPA 5km away, SPA AQUUM, where I will be able to offer you a 2x1 invitation upon arrival. My cat lives on the terrace, she is very affectionate and very street, no problem without coming with a pet !! If they are allergic, better reserve another house to avoid problems. They will park for free at the door of the house ... thank you !! Managed by a private host

Description:
Offering a wide range of leisure facilities and activities, Apartamentos Parque Mar is located at the beachfront of Cala dOr. It offers well-equipped apartments with balcony or terrace and sea views.

There is a heated swimming pool, a salt-water pool and a childrens pool at Parque Mar. Loungers are available for free. Sports facilities include volleyball and tennis court, as well as a ping-pong table and a billiards table.

Set in extensive gardens, staff at Parque Mar offer daily entertainment for children and adults, including a childrens club and a nightclub. Guests can practise Tai-Chi, take painting lessons or do Nordic walking.

The restaurant offers a varied buffet and themed dinners with live music. There is also a bar and a pool-side snack bar.

The Vall dOr Golf Course is 15 minutes drive away. Cala Mondragó Nature Reserve is 14 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 1 hour by car. Description:
Boasting pool views, Los Naranjos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a bar, around 11 km from Alicante Golf. This villa has a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking.

The air-conditioned villa consists of 4 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the villa.

The villa offers a childrens playground.

Alicante Train Station is 17 km from Los Naranjos, while Terra Natura is 39 km from the property. The nearest airport is AlicanteElche Miguel Hernández, 30 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. A damage deposit of EUR 300 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
Hotel Alda Centro Oviedo is in Oviedos business district, 700 metres from Uria Train Station and 200 metres from the bus station. It offers continental breakfast and comfortable rooms with free internet.

This budget hotel feature warm colours and parquet floors. They come with eiderdown duvets, satellite 22" TV and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer.

The Hotel Alda Centro Oviedo has a cafeteria and offers luggage storage and a safety deposit box. The popular cider boulevard on Calle Gascona Street is just 10 minutes walk away. There is a bus stop 50 metres away, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease. The property also offers bicycle storage facilities.

Oviedos old town is 10 minutes walk away. Here you can find the Museum Block featuring the 13th-century San Salvador Cathedral, the Asturias Museum of Fine Arts and the Archaeological Museum.  Oviedo university is 200 metres away.

This hotel is ideally located on the famous Camino de Santiago route, and it is 8 minutes walk from the pre-Romanesque San Julián de los Prados Basilica. Please inform Hotel Alda Centro Oviedo in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
This hotel is located in Jerte and is not far from a selection of bars, pubs, restaurants and nightspots. Plasencia with its bus and railway station and shopping venues is approximately 40 km or 35 minutes by public transport from the hotel.

In addition to a reception area with a hotel safe, cloakroom and lift access, facilities available to guests at this 17-room hotel de charme include a café, restaurant, conference facilities and wireless Internet access. Room and laundry services and a bike hire service are also provided. Guests arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park.

In addition to a private bathroom with a shower, bathtub and a hairdryer, in-room amenities include a direct dial telephone, TV, radio, Internet access and a minibar, as well as a double bed and individually regulated air conditioning and heating units. A safety deposit box and a balcony/terrace are also included as standard.

There is an outdoor swimming pool on the hotel grounds with sun loungers and parasols laid out for use by the water's edge. Guests can enjoy a soak in the hot tub, work up a sweat in the sauna and steam room or work on their suntans on the sun terrace. Relaxing massage treatments and special spa packages are available to be enjoyed, and guests can explore the local area on horseback. Meanwhile, fans of the fairway can head to the nearest golf course, which is about a 75-minute drive from the establishment.

Bed and breakfast and half- and full-board stays are available to be booked at the hotel. A continental buffet breakfast is served each morning. Lunch and dinner may be taken à la carte or selected from various set menu options.

With a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a mountain view. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box.

Guests at La Guzmana de Ronda can enjoy a continental breakfast.

You can play darts at the accommodation, and bike hire is available.

Description:
Casa de Hilario is 17 km from Lanzarote Airport, next to Timanfaya National Park. Set in gardens, it features an outdoor pool, free parking and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

The hotel is decorated in country style, featuring wooden beams, and a lounge has a large stone fireplace. There is an interior garden patio, and an outdoor terrace offering mountain and Atlantic Ocean views.

All rooms at the Hilario come with satellite TV, and you can rent the safe. Handmade furniture adds to the rustic charm. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, hairdryer, and a large shower.

The Casa de Hilario has a tour desk, where you can hire a car or bicycle. Please inform Casa de Hilario in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Set in Cunit, 1.9 km from Cunit Beach and 2 km from Platja Segur de Calafell, Villa La Roca offers accommodation with free WiFi and restaurant. This villa has a private pool, a garden and free private parking.

Providing access to a patio with garden views, the air-conditioned villa consists of 4 bedrooms. Offering a terrace with pool views, this villa also features a cable TV, a well-equipped kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a dishwasher, as well as 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hairdryer.

Description:
This hotel is located in the centre of Sabiñánigo (Huesca), just 300 metres from the railway and bus stations. It lies only about 35-40 km from the main ski resorts in the Aragonese Pyrenees (Formigal, Candanchú and Astún).

This hotel was founded in September 2005 and comprises a total of 50 rooms, 2 of which are adapted for people with disabilities and 5 are superior rooms for families. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned city hotel include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and check-out service, a hotel safe, a cloakroom, a lift and a café/bar. It also offers a pub, a restaurant and WLAN/Internet access. Guests may also take advantage of the laundry service and there is parking and a garage available for those arriving by car (charges apply to both).

All rooms come with a fully fitted private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, as well as a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, Internet access, a radio and a minibar. They are also equipped with centrally regulated air conditioning, heating, a safe and either a balcony or a terrace.argas Golf Course is just a 10-minute drive away.

A continental breakfast may be selected from a buffet or be served to the tables and the midday and evening meals can be enjoyed from a set menu. The midday meal is additionally available in buffet form.

Description:
Hotel LAlguer Nou is situated just 500 metres from FC Barcelonas Camp Nou Stadium and 220 metres from Collblanc Metro Station. This family-run hotel offers a bar, lounge and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at the LAlguer Nou Hotel are simple and functional, with tiled floors. Each room comes with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have air conditioning in summer and central heating in winter.

Hotel LAlguer Nou serves a daily breakfast consisting of a buffet of cold and hot dishes.

Collblanc Metro Station takes you to Barcelona Aiport in 30 minutes. LAlguer Nou is a 20-minute walk from the campus of Barcelona University. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute bus ride away, and regular bus services stop within 200 metres of the hotel. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
If you are not the owner of the credit card used to make the reservation, please contact the property in advance.

Please note that there is an extra charge of 20, per person per night for any additional guests at check-in.

Description:
Offering an outdoor pool, a garden, a furnished terrace with barbecue facilities and panoramic views of the city and the sea, Villa Cactus - PlusHolidays is located 3 km from Calpe city center.

This property is accessed by an outdoor staircase and comes with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a hairdryer. The living area includes sofas, TV and dining area. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave and toaster.

Set on a residential area, the closest supermarket is 500 metres from the property.  You will find bars and restaurants in Calpe.

Arenal-Bol Beach is 8 minutes drive away and Cala Fustera Cove is 3 km away. A 45-minute drive will take you to Alicante Airport. There is free parking on site. A damage deposit of EUR 500 is required. The host charges this 14 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that late check-in after 20:00 carries a EUR 50 surcharge.

Description:
Set next to Santiago de Compostela Cathedral, Hostal O Patron offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and private bathrooms. It features a restaurant serving Galician cuisine.

Each simply decorated room at Hostal O Patron has a TV and a desk.

There is a selection of shops, bars and cafes in the streets surrounding the Patron. The citys main square, Plaza del Obradeiro, is a 3-minute walk away.

Hostal O Patron has easy access to Santiago de Compostelas charming old town. The citys railway station is 1.5 km away. Please let Hostal O Patron know your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking or contact the property.

Description:
Casa Les, a property with barbecue facilities, is set in Les, 23 km from Luchon Golf Course, 37 km from Lake of Oô, as well as 42 km from Comminges Golf Course. The property features mountain and garden views, and is 37 km from Col de Peyresourde.

The holiday home comes with 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. The holiday home also offers a seating area, washing machine and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a bath.

After a day of skiing or cycling, guests can relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.

The nearest airport is Tarbes Lourdes Pyrénées Airport, 104 km from the holiday home. Please inform Casa Les in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
A damage deposit of EUR 150 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.

Description:
Set on a restored 19th-century farm, Camping Pueblo Blanco features a typical Andalusian patio with country views, a seasonal outdoor pool and free parking.

Each wooden chalet-style bungalow has a furnished porch, air conditioning and heating. There is a living room with a TV and sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, and the kitchenette includes a fridge and microwave.

Regional specialities are served in the restaurant. There is a bar and packed lunches can be requested. Vending machines for drinks are also available.

A laundry service is offered and you can hire a bicycle at the tour desk. The complex has a childrens playground and a games room. Wi-Fi is available for an extra charge. Please inform Complejo Pueblo Blanco in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

The villa has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

The villa offers a sun terrace. Guests at VH CostaBlanca - CASARAYODELSOL can enjoy hiking and snorkelling nearby, or make the most of the outdoor pool.

Address: Almuzara S Nº 32514 BoborásProvince of Ourense
Description:
This charming hotel is set in a 19th-Century Galician manor house in the countryside of the beautiful Carballiño region. Pazo Almuzara has an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by 10,000m² of gardens.

It has simple, attractive rooms with private bathrooms. There is free Wi-Fi in all areas of the hotel.

The Pazos public areas have an impressive art collection. There is a lounge, dining area and classic meeting rooms.

Ribeiro DO wine is made in the nearby valleys. Trips to wine cellars, vineyards and wine-tasting can be organized.

The local area is famous for its spas. These include the Termas da Chavasqueira and Caldas de Partovia. There are also many golf courses in the surroundings.

Free parking is available onsite. The Oseira Monastery is only a short drive away. It is famous for its Gregorian Chanting. Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Tue 17 Nov 2020 until Sun 30 May 2021

Residencia Miramar offers rooms with small, furnished terraces overlooking the sea and the beach of San Vicente de la Barquera, a peaceful seaside town. There is free Wi-Fi throughout the property.

The rooms are simply decorated and each one offers a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. They also include a flat-screen TV.

Residencia Miramar has access for guests with reduced mobility. This includes a lift from the hotels garage.

The Picos de Europa Mountains and the Covadonga Lakes are around 1.5 hours drive away, while Santander is around 60 km from the hotel. Tourist information can be provided.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the holiday home, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

Description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Bordeaux, Burdigala Homes - Appart du Vieux Marché offers city views and a shared lounge. The Great Bell Bordeaux and the Museum of Aquitaine are within 300 metres and 400 metres of the apartment, and free WiFi is provided.

The apartment is equipped with 4 bedrooms, a kitchen with fridge and dishwasher, and 1 bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a washing machine. A flat-screen TV, Blu-ray player and DVD player, as well as a CD player are provided.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Michel Basilica, Saint-André Cathedral and Stone Bridge. The nearest airport is BordeauxMérignac Airport, 13 km from Burdigala Homes - Appart du Vieux Marché. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Late check in is not possible.

Set in a large park, this 19th-century mansion is located on the seafront with direct access to Nauzan beach. It offers an outdoor swimming pool with a terrace.

The different room types at the Hotel Residence De Rohan are decorated in a stylish manner, featuring parquet flooring. All rooms are equipped with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with Canal+ channels, and have a private bathroom with free toiletries.

A hearty buffet breakfast is served every morning, in the living room, on the terrace or in your bedroom.There are several restaurants located below in Nauzan beach,

The Hotel Residence De Rohan is located only 3 kilometres from the popular seaside town of Royan and 2.3 km from Pontaillac Casino. Please inform Hôtel The Originals Résidence de Rohan (EX RELAIS DU SILENCE) in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
The rooms are spread over 3 floors and there is no lift in the guest house.

Description:
HeadLine : Near La Défense

Location : With a stay at Aparthotel Adagio la Défense Courbevoie in Courbevoie (Cur de Ville), you ll be steps from La Défense and a 3-minute drive from Grande Arche. This 4-star aparthotel is 2 mi (3.2 km) from Paris La Défense Arena and 3.3 mi (5.3 km) from Arc de Triomphe.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 99 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. 40-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Dining : Take advantage of the aparthotel s room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

Description:
La Bastide Onhora is an apartment looking out to sea. It is located in the historical and cultural commune of Grasse, which holds the International Museum of Perfume.

The property features a swimming pool, garden and furnished terrace. Sleeping up to 4 guests, it has 1 double bedroom and 1 sofa bed. Facilities include Wi-Fi, free parking and a flat-screen TV.

Self-catering, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with all the necessary utensils for preparing meals. You can find restaurants in the centre of Grasse, 3 km away.

You might be interested to visit Grasses 11th century Notre Dame du Puy Cathedral, which features works of art by Rubens and Jean-Honoré Fragonard.

Local destinations include Saint-Paul-de-Vence, 20 km away, Cannes, 22 km away, and Antibes, 26 km away. You can find beaches at Cannes and Antibes. Please inform La Bastide Onhora in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Sun 27 Sept 2020 until Fri 28 May 2021

Description:
Appartement Quartier Mazarin offers accommodation in Aix-en-Provence, 300 metres from Cours Mirabeau and 50 metres from Granet Museum.

This 35-m² apartment has a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

There is a fully equipped kitchen with a coffee maker, a toaster and an electric kettle. Many bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

Guests can enjoy hiking in the surrounding area. Sainte-Victoire Mountain is 8 km away. Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station is 15 km from the property and Marseille Provence Airport is 25 km away. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

This apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a kitchen with a fridge, and a living room.

HotelName: Chambre D'Hotes La Tour De Brazalem
Description:
Set in a building from the early 16th-Century, La Tour de Brazalem is located in the centre of Nérac Medieval Town. It offers a garden, terrace and communal TV lounge.

Some rooms feature a TV, desk, wardrobe, refrigerator and an electric kettle. They are complete with an en suite bathroom. The studio boasts a kitchenette equipped with an oven, stove and microwave.

A continental breakfast is provided each morning for those staying in the guest rooms at La Tour de Brazalem. Restaurants can be found within walking distance.

The Gallo Roman Remains and Henri IV Castle are both just 300 metres away. Agen is just a 35-minute drive from the property and free underground private parking is possible on site. Free public parking is also available nearby. Please inform Chambre dHôtes La Tour de Brazalem in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that some low suspension cars or ordinary cars may find it difficult to enter the car park. Public parking is available nearby.

For prepayment, to be made by cheque or bank transfer, guests should contact the property. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

Cheques, cash and Chèques Vacances holiday vouchers are an accepted method of payment.

Arrivals after 21:00 are not possible.

Description:
Set in a 19th-century mansion in the village Roquefort in the Landes Armagnac region, Le Saint-Vincent has spacious and individually decorated and soundproofed rooms with en-suite bathrooms, a TV, free WiFi access for one device, a telephone and a safe.

Le St Vincents restaurant serves gourmet dishes cooked on site with fresh produce from the villages market. Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast in the hotels restaurant or terrace as well as in the room.

Le St Vincent operates primarily with renewable energy. Guests can enjoy hiking and cycling around the Gascogne Parc Naturel or canoeing on the nearby small river. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
From September to May the reception and the restaurant are closed on Thursday and Sunday evening. From June to August, they are open every day.

The restaurant is available upon reservation only. Please contact the property to book the restaurant in advance.

A surcharge applies for arrivals outside check-in hours. All requests for late arrival are subject to confirmation by the property.

Please note that the guest rooms are not serviced by a lift.

Please note that breakfast starts at 7:30.

Description: Housed in an old farm building, Appartement La Poulotte offers accommodation in Couchey, 10 km from Dijon. The apartment features a terrace and a barbecue. The property is a 25-minute drive from Dijon Train Station and 1.3 km from Marsannay Charon Bus Station, providing direct access to Dijon. Free WiFi is available. With views of the garden, this ground floor apartment features a TV and a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. It also has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Several vineyards can be found in the surroundings. Gevrey-Chambertin is a 9-minute drive from the property and Beaune is 31 km from Appartement La Poulotte, while Dole is 54 km away. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 52 km from the property. Free car park is available onsite. Please inform Appartement La Poulotte in advance of your expected arrival time. Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 3 individually decorated guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and hair dryers. Conveniences include blackout drapes/curtains, housekeeping is provided once per stay, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Dining : At Villa Aghjanella, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 9:00 AM.

Description:
Apartment Felicita has a terrace and is situated in Cros-de-Cagnes, within just less than 1 km of Beach du Port and a 18-minute walk of Plage des Flots Bleus. Featuring free private parking, the 3-star apartment is less than 1 km from Cros de Cagnes.

Boasting a DVD player, the apartment has a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a dishwasher, a living room, a dining area, 1 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with a bath or shower. A TV is offered.

Russian Orthodox Cathedral is 8.8 km from the apartment, while Allianz Riviera Stadium is 9.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte dAzur Airport, 5 km from Apartment Felicita. Description:
This hotel in the medieval town of Martel features 7000m² of private gardens, an outdoor pool and a restaurant with terrace or fireside dining. It consists of several buildings around the former chapel, Sainte Anne.

The guest rooms at LHostellerie du Relais Sainte Anne are elegantly decorated and feature antique-style furniture. Each room has a flat-screen TV and some rooms have free Wi-Fi access.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. Gastronomic cuisine featuring fresh products from the local market, is served in the restaurant.

Activities in the area include canoe and kayaking from Gluges, 5.5 km away and the tourist railway in Quercy (1 km away). Souillac Train Station 15km away from the hotel. The medieval town of Rocamadour is within 20 km.

Description:
This hotel is located in central Perigueux, 300 metres from the historic city centre. It offers views of the St Front Cathedral and free Wi-Fi internet access.

The rooms at the Hotel Des Barris have TVs with TNT. Some rooms also offer a view of the cathedral.

Guests are invited to enjoy Italian cuisine specialties at the hotels restaurant, La Cantina, which also offers an unobstructed view.

Hôtel des Barris makes an ideal base for exploring the Dordogne region. There is a free public car park just 20 metres from the hotel. Located in the village of Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, this hotel has a restaurant with a terrace offering views of the surrounding valley. The hotel is located a 10-minute drive from Esparron-de-Verdon Lake and Gréoux-les-Bains.

Guest rooms at Hotel La Fontaine are simply decorated and equipped with a TV and a telephone. They each offer an en suite bathroom with either a bathtub or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. A snack menu is available in the restaurant for lunch, and in the evening guests are invited to sample traditional Provençal cuisine.

The hotel has a garden, where guests can relax during the summer months. Additional facilities available on site include free parking and free Wi-Fi internet access.

The villa is accessed via an outdoor staircase and is fitted with air conditioning and free WiFi Free private parking is available on site. Bed linen and towels are included in the price and beds are made for your arrival. Other facilities at Grimaldines include an outdoor pool. Guests can have groceries delivered to the villa for free, upon prior request. You can play tennis at the property, and the area is popular for skiing. Please note that water and electricity are not included in the price. A meter reading will be taken upon arrival and guests will be charged for their water and electricity consumption upon departure. Located on a 18-hole golf course, Domaine du Val de Sorne offers you a natural setting and is the perfect choice for a relaxing leisure stay.

The hotels rooms offer a cosy atmosphere. They were decorated individually to make your stay as unique as possible. They offer a view of the golf course.

After a day on the green, have a drink in the bar or sit by the fireplace in the lounge before having dinner at the hotels restaurant.

With a golf course, a swimming pool and a sauna, Domaine du Val de Sorne is the perfect choice for golfers as well as for people willing to have a relaxing stay. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
This Logis hotel is located 50 metres from the quay, in the Brittany coastal town of Roscoff. The hotel offers en-suite guestrooms with TV and free Wi-Fi.

Les Chardons Bleus Restaurant serves traditional cuisine and a selection of seafood dishes. Homemade jam. honey and bread can be enjoyed for breakfast.

Guests of Les Chardons Bleus can enjoy the many surrounding beaches and as well as fishing and water sports.

The Roscoff train station is just 300 metres from Les Chardons Bleus and the port offers ferry connections to Cork, Rossiare and Plymouth. Please note that the restaurant is closed on Monday.

Description:
Appartement LPK offers accommodation in Strasbourg, 400 metres from The Petite France.

The apartment is situated on the 3rd floor is is accessed via a staircase. A dishwasher and an oven can be found in the kitchen and there is a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 500 metres from Appartement LPK, while Strasbourg Christmas Market is 500 metres from the property. Entzheim Airport is 10 km away. Public parking is available 5 metres from the propertys entrance. A security deposit of EUR 200 is required upon arrival for incidentals. This deposit is fully refundable upon check-out and subject to a damage inspection of the accommodation.
Please inform Appartement LPK in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that if you plan to arrive between 21:30 and 23:00, the property will charge an extra fee of EUR 40.

Description:
Situated in private gardens surrounding an outdoor swimming pool, this B&B has en suite rooms and a self-catering guest house. It offers free Wi-Fi and parking just 3 km from Cluny.

Guest rooms at La Pierre Folle are decorated in light, neutral colours and have exposed wooden beams and stone feature walls. Each spacious room has wired internet facilities and opens onto the patio which has sun loungers and umbrellas.

A buffet breakfast is provided daily and can be taken on the terrace in warmer months. Evening meals featuring dishes from the south of France are also available on request.

La Pierre Folle Chambres Dhôtes is a 10-minute drive from Macon Loche TGV Train Station. In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.

Set in Douarnenez and located on the beachfront, 34 km from Brest, Village Vacances Ternélia 3* features an indoor pool and a bar. Free WiFi access is available. Quimper is 22 km away.

All of the rooms here are serviced by a lift. Each includes a flat-screen TV and a desk. The private bathrooms are fitted with a shower and free toiletries.

Breakfast is served every day in the propertys restaurant.

A kids club is also available, free of charge as well as a swimming pool.

You can play table tennis at the property, and the area is popular for hiking. Concarneau is 41 km from Village Vacances Ternélia 3*, while Bénodet is 31 km from the property. Daily cleaning is possible at an extra cost and upon request.

Please note that the childrens club and sport programme is available for free from Monday to Friday during the school holidays.

Please specify the number and the age of the guests when reserving.

Please note that alcoholic beverages are not included in the meal plans.

Please note that pets are allowed under certain conditions and extra fees may apply. Please contact the property directly for further information.

A towel kit is available upon request for EUR 8.

Set just 16 km from Rodez Train Station, Gîte La Planhe offers accommodation in Bozouls with access to a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a garden, as well as a 24-hour front desk. Featuring free private parking, the holiday home is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking, skiing and fishing.

The holiday home with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

The holiday home offers a barbecue.

Notre Dame Cathedral is 18 km from Gîte La Planhe, while Museum Denys-Puech is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Rodez - Aveyron Airport, 21 km from the accommodation. Please inform Gîte La Planhe in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
A damage deposit of EUR 500 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries, while the kitchen has a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. A stovetop and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Chateau de Chaumont sur Loire is 18 km from the apartment, while Château de Chenonceau is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tours Val de Loire Airport, 25 km from Gite NiLou. HotelName: Neoresid Résidence Les Jardins de Mozart
Description:
Located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Les Jardins de Mozart offers self-catering studios and apartments. La Rotonde Fountain and Cours Mirabeau Boulevard are 400 metres away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All accommodation features a desk, kitchenette and a dining. The kitchenette is equipped with a stove, refrigerator and microwave.  The private bathrooms have a shower. Some units have a terrace or a balcony. One set of bed linen and towels is included in the price.

Facilities at Les Jardins de Mozart include a vending machine and a lift. A laundry service is available for an extra charge.

Restaurants, bars and shops can be found within a 1-minute walk of the accommodation, next to the Grand Provence Theatre, the Cité du livre and the Black Pavilion.

The bus station is only 500 metres away where guests can find the shuttles that take you to the TGV Train Station or Marseille Airport. Parking is available on site for an extra charge and upon reservation. Please note that the reception is open:
- Monday to Friday from 09:00 to 12:00 and from 15:00 to 18:00
- Wednesday from 09:00 to 12:00
- Closed on Saturday, Sunday and public holidays

Three days before your arrival, you will receive an email containing all the information to access your room even outside opening hours. Please contact the property if you havent received this email.

Please note that a EUR 250 damages deposit will be requested for stays of longer than 1 week. This may be used to charge for any damages incurred to the accommodation during your stay.

Guests are asked to clean the kitchen upon their departure and to take the bins out.

The property will change linen for stays of a week, or upon request at the reception.

Description:
Offering panoramic views of the Var Valley, Le Beau Site is located in Gattières. Free WiFi access is available in public areas.

Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom has a shower and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a fan. Some rooms have a terrace with outdoor furniture.

At Le Beau Site you will find a garden, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Homemade dinners are available upon request.

The property offers free parking. Nice Côte dAzur Airport is 18 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Villa Cecile is located in Yvoire, on the shores of Lake Geneva. It offers a hammam, hot tub and sauna, as well as a swimming pool and free WiFi.

Guest-rooms are all equipped with a plasma TV and some have a balcony overlooking the pool. Other rooms overlook the garden and have a private terrace.

Villa Cecile offers a restaurant which serves traditional cuisine and local wines. Meals can be taken in the dining room by the fireplace in winter, and next to the pool in summer.

The marina in Yvoire is a few minutes away. Guests can enjoy lake cruises, walk in the outdoors or explore the medieval city. You may wish to take a boat ride to Nyon, 20 minutes away. Please inform Villa Cécile in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Hotel La Licorne is located 600 metres from the beach and yacht club in Carnac-Plage, on the south Brittany coast. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

The guest rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with a USB point.

The Licorne serves a continental breakfast in the hotel dining room or on the terrace.  Guests can also relax in the hotels shaded garden.

Hotel la Licorne is 1 km from the centre of Carnac old town where you can visit the megalithic Carnac Stones site. Paid secure on-site parking is available for guests exploring the Morbihan region by car. Please inform Hotel La Licorne in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Situated in Fréjus, Maeva Particuliers Residence Cap Hermes provides a seasonal outdoor pool and accommodation with a TV.

The units at the apartment have a fully equipped kitchenette with dining area, a microwave and a fridge. A stovetop and coffee machine are also available.

Description:
A tram stop is located just in front of the Lieu Dit, which offers direct links to the centre of Nantes in less than 10 minutes. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi access, an "épicerie" an on-site bar and a restaurant.

The rooms at Lieu Dit have been simply decorated using very colorful tones. Each one features a high end matress and an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a bath or shower.

Breakfast can be enjoyed in the comfort of guest rooms. You may also choose to have an aperitif in the bar before sampling traditional cuisine in the brassiere-style restaurant.

Château des ducs de Bretagne and Nantes famous Ile Feydeau are both less than 5 km from the property.

Description:
Situated in Tignes in the Rhône-Alps Region, Chalet Isabella by Chalet Chardons features a terrace, a shared lounge and views of the mountains. The property has a hot tub and a sauna. Free WiFi is available.

The guest rooms have a private or a shared bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Linen, towels, dressing gowns are also provided.

The half board rate includes a 5-course dinner with canapes, cheese board and wine, and is available 6 days a week.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings including skiing, cycling, hiking and fishing.

The Brévières Elevator lift is 100 metres from the chalet and goes to and from the slopes and the Brévières Gondola. A secure garage is available on site, which includes a bicycle cleaning station, a bicycle repair corner, ski equipment storage and a heated boot warmer. Please inform Chalet Isabella by Chalet Chardons in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that dinner is not served on Wednesdays.

Description:
Situation in Sidmouth on Devons Jurassic Coast, The Woodlands Hotel offers high-quality accommodation 6 minutes walk from Sidmouth seafront. With its own spacious restaurant, bar and attractive garden, Woodlands provides free parking and free Wi-Fi. The hotel also offers limited pet friendly rooms.

Each room has a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee facilities. All have en suite facilities, with a bath or shower.

A full English breakfast is served each morning. The restaurant, conservatory and bar provide pleasant surroundings to enjoy evening meals or a real Devon cream tea. Dinner reservations are required.

The Woodlands Hotel is within a 5-minute walk of the town centre and Sidmouth Museum. Exmouth beach is around 10 miles down the coast, and the cathedral city of Exeter is just a 30-minute drive.

* Please be aware that the whilst the Woodlands Hotel is Pet friendly there are only a limited number of rooms available please confirm availability before booking. Pets are also not permitted in our restaurant, there is a Covered area on our Patio where guests can eat with their Pets. In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Pets:
Pets can be accommodated for a surcharge but are subject to availability and by prior arrangement with The Woodlands Hotel.
Please be advised Pets are Not permitted in the hotels restaurant.
Pet-friendly rooms are limited and you must contact the property prior to arrival if you wish to Bring pets.

Dining:
Should guests wish to eat at the restaurant they are advised to reserve a table in advance.

Payment:
The Woodlands Hotel does not accept American Express.

Description:
Catwell House is a peaceful, 17th-century country-house B&B located between the Quantocks, Exmoor National Park and the sea. Catwell House is just a 5-minute walk from the village of Williton.

Offering a secluded sunny garden in summer and refreshments on arrival, Catwell House is spacious, charming and has cosy log fires and old beams. Each room has free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with Freeview channels, Egyptian cotton bed linen and a complimentary hospitality tray.

The property is set at the end of a long, private drive-way, overlooking fields and the West Somerset countryside. You can go walking and the Coleridge Way, as well as other walking routes, can be found nearby. Guests will find a range of pubs, a restaurant and shops in Williton.

Private secure parking is available on site. The village of Williton features the Bakelite Museum, The West Somerset Railway and Exmoor National Park is just 2 miles from Catwell House B&B. Bristol Airport is a 65-minute drive from the property. Please inform Catwell House in advance of your expected arrival time. Address: The Square, St Mawes TruroCornwall TR2 5DJ
Description:
On the picturesque harbour of St Mawes, with views of the Roseland Peninsula and beyond, The Rising Sun has an outdoor seating area, restaurant, bar, free parking and free Wi-Fi.

The rooms have en suite facilities with a bath, shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. They also feature a flat-screen TV with Freeview channels and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms have sea views.

In the morning, guests can enjoy a full English breakfast or a continental buffet option. The restaurant serves traditional English food including local fresh fish, and in the afternoon, homemade scones and cakes are available.

The conservatory and the lounge have real fires during the cold months and it is also possible to soak up the sun on the terrace, while enjoying a cup of tea or a glass of wine.

St Mawes Castle can be reached in less than 20 minutes on foot and St Mawes Ferry Landing, with ferries to Falmouth and Place Creek, is less than 5 minutes walk away. The car park can accommodate 5 to 6 cars.

Description:
Herdwick Guest House is located in Keswick, within the picturesque Lake District National Park. Named after the local breed of sheep, the property also offers free WiFi throughout. The guest house is in a Victorian property arranged over 3 floors built around 1870. is situated in a quiet residential area with free unrestricted parking.

All rooms feature en-suite facilities, a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. Hospitality trays are also provided.

A full Cumbrian breakfast using local produce is served each morning with a range of cereals.

Derwent Water can be reached within a 5-minute drive or a 10-minute walk and local fells to explore are Skiddaw, Blencathra and Catbells. Keswick town centre is a 5-minute walk away and features a theatre, parks and art galleries. Please inform Herdwick Guest House in advance of your expected arrival time. Lillys Pad boasts individually styled rooms that are full of character. Three rooms have an en-suite bathroom and one room have a private bathroom, all equipped with bathrobes and slippers. Each room comes complete with a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee making facilities.

Breakfast is included in the room rate. Lillys Pad is located above the award-winning Lillys Tea Room, which is nut free and can cater for a wide range of dietary needs.  There is a pub, post office and local shop a short walk away in Keelby.

Description:
Here at Premier Inn, we want you to love staying with us. We want to make sure you have the best nights sleep possible. So if theres anything we can do, just have a chat with one of our friendly team members. Were on stand-by 24/7 and are always more than happy to help. Its all part of our award-winning service.

With over 700 hotels in the UK were the largest hotel chain in the country. With hotels in city centres, near airports, by popular attractions and in smaller towns for a rural retreat, youre never more than a 20-minute drive from us. And were opening more and more hotels every week. 

Our luxury king-size Hypnos bed is the stuff of dreams  and its now in every one of our hotels.  Drift off on an ultra-comfy, pillow-top, pocket-spring mattress, topped with a toasty duvet and your choice of firm and soft pillows. All of our rooms also include a powerful shower and personal bathroom, Freeview TV with 80 channels, a work desk and chair, tea and coffee making facilities, blackout curtains and free WIFI for the duration of your stay. Less than 2 miles from Heathrow Airport, this Premier Inn is 5 minutes drive from the M4 motorway. A 24-hour Costa Coffee shop and a restaurant feature on-site.

The M25 motorway is less than 10 minutes drive away. London Victoria Rail Station can be reached after a 45-minute rail journey from Heathrow Underground, situated within Heathrow Airport.

A TV, tea and coffee making facilities, a hairdryer and a seating area feature in each spacious and air conditioned room at the Premier Inn London Heathrow Airport (Bath Road). Toiletries are provided in each modern bathroom.

The full all-you-can-eat breakfast has a selection of cooked items, including vegetarian sausages, as well as a wide continental selection.  Traditional and contemporary dishes are served in the Thyme Restaurant.

Some rooms at Premier Inn can take 2 adults and up to 2 children (under 16 years). The 2 children also get a free full breakfast when accompanied by an adult eating a full breakfast. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
No.10 Broadway is an apartment located in Broadway, in the Cotswolds Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. Offering free WiFi and free onsite parking.

The apartment overlooks Broadways busy village square and has a wireless sound system and a TV with DVD player. A dishwasher, washer/dryer, an oven and a microwave can be found in the kitchen and there is a private bathroom. Towels and bed linen are available in this apartment.

Broadway high street is lined with horse chestnut trees and offers a range of independent shops, restaurants and galleries. The Ashmolean Museum Broadway is just a 7-minute walk away, whilst Broadway Tower is a 10-minute drive.

The area is popular for golfing. The National Trust property, Chastleton House can be reached within 18 miles. Stow-on-the-Wold is 12 miles from No.10 Broadway.

The property can be reached via the A44 road. Birmingham Airport is the nearest airport to the apartment and is 39 miles away. Managed by a private host

Description:
Directly on the ski slopes of Alpe di Mera, Rifugio Camparient is 9 km from Scopello, reached with a cable car or snowmobile in the winter. It offers free Wi-Fi and a traditional restaurant.

With a mountain-view balcony, all rooms feature wood floors and Alpine-style furnishings. Bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer and toiletry set.

An extensive buffet breakfast is available daily, with sweet and savoury options.

On-site facilities include a sauna, bike rental and a panoramic tennis court.

In the winter, the prioperty provides a snowmobile service to a parking area in Scopello. In the summer, you can drive to the hotel. Decorated with simple wood furniture, all rooms at Terzo Crotto feature marble floors, a fan and a flat-screen TV with Sky TV. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries.

The Crottos restaurant serves Italian cuisine and specialities from the Lake Como area. An extensive list of local and international wines is available.

Staff offers storage space for your ski equipment.

Terzo Crotto Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the patrician Villa dEste and 3 km from the Como Nord exit of the A9 motorway. Please inform Hotel Terzo Crotto in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Set in Altavilla Milicia, 2 km from San Nicola lArena Beach, Principe Alogna Hotel & SPA offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. 2.8 km from Trabia Beach and 28 km from Fontana Pretoria, the property provides a terrace and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a garden view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms come with a safety deposit box and selected rooms here will provide you with sea views. The units feature a wardrobe.

The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or American options. At Principe Alogna Hotel & SPA you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Palermo Cathedral is 29 km from the accommodation, while Cefalù Cathedral is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Falcone-Borsellino Airport, 57 km from Principe Alogna Hotel & SPA.

Description:
Overlooking the port of Rio Marina, Hotel Rio Sul Mare is located on the shimmering coast near the most beautiful beaches with black sand and sparkling minerals.

Most of the rooms boast a splendid sea view, other rooms have a view over the characteristic town of Rio Marina. they are also all equipped with private bathroom with shower, TV, mini fridge, air conditioning and free WiFi.

The friendly team of staff guarantee a warm welcome and a personalised service. They will be on hand to provide you with all the tourist information you require to make your stay on Elba special.

In the village of Rio Marina near the hotel you will find a diving center, the rental of rubber dinghies, boats, scooters and electric bikes. The nearest beach is only 50 meters away. You can spend your day on the island visiting the beautiful beaches one after the other.

Description:
Agriturismo Ronchi Di SantEgidio is a working farm set on a hill, with views of the Grado Lagoon and the Prealpi Giulie mountains. The main building is a fortified farmhouse from the 13th century. The Rosazzo Abbey is 1 km away.

Rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, and a private bathroom. Each room is spacious and offers views of the hills and original period furniture.

Breakfast at the Ronchi Di SantEgidio is a varied buffet. Our restaurant offers traditional cuisine of Friuli during the weekend. Please note the restaurant is open for lunch and dinner on Saturday and Sunday.

Please note that the restaurant is open from November to August 15th, with the following time:

Albergo San Remo is set in a renovated 1960s building in Montebelluna, 800 metres from the towns centre and a 20-minute drive from Treviso. It offers free parking, free Wi-Fi and a restaurant.

Rooms are simply decorated and come with wooden furniture and either carpeted or parquet floors. Each one has an LCD satellite TV and a private bathroom with toiletries.

The continental-style breakfast includes both sweet and savoury products and can also be served in your room for free. The restaurant specialises in local cuisine and serves homemade pasta, bread and cakes.

Bus number 10 stops opposite San Remo hotel and links with Montebelluna Station, 1.2 km away. Please note that the property does not have a lift.

The restaurant is closed on Sundays.

Description:
For those who enjoy holidays in contact with nature and animals . A riding stable , a track workout and a chance to make wonderful day trips to the beach on horseback are our strengths . With garden views, Lo Sperone is set in Alcamo and has a restaurant, ticket service, bar and garden. Free WiFi is offered.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a terrace and/or patio.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy an Italian breakfast.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and the property can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Monreale is 38 km from Lo Sperone. The nearest airport is Falcone-Borsellino Airport, 42 km from the property.

Description:
Offering an outdoor pool, a restaurant and free bike rental, Agriturismo Casale Di Gricciano is 3 km from the Etruscan Banditaccia Necropolis. WiFi and parking are both free at this organic farm stay, which produces spirits, jam, and olive oil.

Rooms of the Casale Di Gricciano are simply furnished, in a classic Mediterranean style. They include a TV and a private bathroom. Some have wrought-iron beds.

Featuring brick details and rural décor, the rustic restaurant serves locally produced food, such as olive oil, wine and salad. Breakfast includes homemade cakes and jams.

The property 10 km from the Equiconfor horse riding centre, while Cerveteri is 8 minutes drive away.  Rome tours can be arranged with the owners. Please inform Agriturismo Casale Di Gricciano in advance of your expected arrival time. Please note that receptions staff are not always available at reception. In case nobody is available at reception for check in, please ask the on-site restaurants staff.

The modern and elegant apartment is composed of a furnished patio, a fully equipped kitchen, a living room with flat-screen TV and 2 separate bedrooms. Towels and bed linen are featured in this self-catering accommodation.

The area is popular for cycling. MUSMA Museum is 2 km from Residenza 1955, while Matera Sassi is 1.9 km away. Bari Karol Wojtyla Airport is 53 km from the property. Please inform Residenza 1955 in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Located in Bagni di Lucca, 36 km from Montecatini Train Station and 38 km from Abetone/Val di Luce, River Idyll provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a garden and barbecue facilities. With river views, this accommodation offers a balcony.

The chalet comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with mountain views.

The chalet offers a hot tub. If you would like to discover the area, fishing is possible in the surroundings.

Leaning Tower of Pisa is 45 km from River Idyll, while Pisa Cathedral is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Pisa International Airport, 62 km from the accommodation. Please inform River Idyll in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 12 guestrooms. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with queen sofa beds. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

Dining : Grab a bite from the grocery/convenience store serving guests of Residence Kalè. For your convenience, a complimentary breakfast is served daily.

Description:
Set in its own garden in the countryside, 2 km from Stintino centre, La Tankitta offers rustic-style rooms with a flat-screen TV. The nearest beach is 4 km away, and private parking is free.

Air-conditioned rooms at la Tankitta turismo rurale come with wrought iron beds, and some have views of the sea in the distance. The private bathroom features free toiletries and a shower.

Breakfast here is an Italian-style buffet including hot drinks and croissants. The restaurant serves typical Sardinian cuisine.

Porto Torres, with ferry links to Genoa and Ajaccio, is 31 km away. The Asinara National Park is reachable from the ferry port of Stintino, and Sassari is reachable by car in 50 minutes. Managed by a private host

Description:
Located in Cortona in the Tuscany region, Il Sentiero has a balcony and garden views. This villa features a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking.

The villa is equipped with 6 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with pool views.

An outdoor swimming pool is available on site and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of the villa.

Arezzo is 33 km from Il Sentiero, while Chianciano Terme is 38 km away. The nearest airport is Perugia San Francesco dAssisi Airport, 49 km from the accommodation. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Sat 30 Oct 2021 until Fri 15 Apr 2022
A damage deposit of EUR 500 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

Ortisei centre is a 12-minute walk from Am Rainell Hof. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Camerano Caves

Location : When you stay at Villa Gens Camuria in Camerano, you ll be next to a golf course, within a 5-minute drive of Camerano Caves and Chiesa di San Francesco. This family-friendly vacation home is 9.1 mi (14.6 km) from Mount Conero and 7.4 mi (11.9 km) from Porto di Ancona.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 17 guestrooms featuring microwaves and espresso makers. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters. 43-inch flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Dining : Enjoy Italian cuisine at The Meal, a seafood restaurant where you can enjoy drinks at the bar/lounge, take in the garden view, and even dine alfresco. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. A complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM and on weekends from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM.

Description:
Offering garden views, Villa Pellarini is an accommodation set in Lignano Sabbiadoro, less than 1 km from Lignano Pineta Beach and 2.8 km from Sabbiadoro Beach. Located less than 1 km from Lignano Riviera Beach, the property provides a garden and free private parking.

This air-conditioned apartment is equipped with 4 bedrooms, a TV, a dining area, a kitchen with a fridge, and a living room. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

Parco Zoo Punta Verde is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Caorle Archaeological Sea Museum is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Trieste Airport, 64 km from Villa Pellarini. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that air conditioning is not included and will be charged EUR 3 per day when used.

Description: Aida is located in Oggebbio and offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a garden and a private beach area. The property is 27 km from Stresa and free private parking is provided. The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge. The apartment provides a childrens playground, a barbecue and a sun terrace. Ascona is 28 km from Aida, while Locarno is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Milan Malpensa Airport, 41 km from the accommodation. This property is located in a residential area and guests are asked to refrain from excessive noise. Please inform Aida in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation. If you require an invoice when booking a prepaid rate, please write this request and your company details in the Ask a question box. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property. You can bring your own bed linen and towels or rent them on site. Bed linen costs EUR 10 per person per stay, while towels cost EUR 5 per person per stay.

Description:
Situated in Giglio Porto, Albergo Meublé Da Ruggero features 2-star accommodation with private balconies. With a restaurant, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom.

At the hotel the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a TV.

Guests at Albergo Meublé Da Ruggero can enjoy a buffet or an Italian breakfast.
