Description:
Featuring ski-to-door access and a wellness centre, Garni La Majon offers rooms with a mountain-view balcony. Located 1 km from the centre of Selva di Val Gardena, it comes with a garden.

Each room here will provide you with a satellite flat-screen TV, parquet or carpeted floors and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some have wood-beamed ceilings.

The spa includes a sauna, a hot tub and a Turkish bath. Ski storage and private parking are free.

Ortisei is reachable in 15 minutes by car. Please inform Garni La Majon in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
From the beginning of December to the end of April the use of the sauna and Turkish bath is free every day except Saturday. Sauna and Turkish bath are available from 17:00 until 20:00.

On Saturdays and from the beginning of May until the end of October, use of the sauna and Turkish bath costs EUR 11 per person and should always be booked in advance.

Description:
Set on the seafront at Cervia and just opposite to the beach, Hotel Souvenir offers air-conditioned rooms with LCD TV. Wi-Fi is free, and the marina is 1.5 km away.

Homemade cakes, fresh fruit, cereal and eggs feature in the Souvenirs breakfast buffet. It is served in the garden in fine weather.

All rooms are soundproofed and come with a mini fridge and a modern en suite bathroom featuring hairdryer and vanity mirror. Some rooms boast a balcony facing the Adriatic Sea.

Discounted beach services are available 10 metres away, including sunbed, umbrella and towel hire.

Buses to Cervia thermal baths and Mirabilandia stop in front of the hotel. Trains to Rimini and Ravenna stop at Cervia-Milano Marittima Train Station, 2.5 km away.

Description:
Set in Marghera, the Nuova Aurora has excellent bus links to Venice, just 10 minutes drive away. It offers free parking, air-conditioned rooms and a 24-hour bar and reception.

The bus stop is 2 minutes walk away and bus number 53E to Venice runs every 12 minutes. The A4 motorway is 3 km away for connections to other destinations along the Brenta Riviera.

Offering free Wi-Fi, rooms at the Nuova Aurora feature a TV and private bathroom with shower.

A sweet Italian-style breakfast is available daily.

Staff will be happy to recommend Margheras best restaurants and you will also find supermarkets and pizzerias in the area. The hotel also features a TV lounge and laundry room. Please note that air conditioning is available from April until October.

Description:
The charming design hotel is situated in Via delle tre Madonne, considered one of the most elegant streets of the city, and is close to Villa Taverna, the residence of the American Ambassador in Rome. The hotel is surrounded by the park of the nearby Villa Borghese and is a few minutes from Piazza del Popolo (by bike or taxi) at the heart of the city. Guests may take a wonderful walk to the historical centre in just 20 minutes, through Villa Borghese, Pincio and then down the stairs to Piazza di Spagna. Guests will find a bus stop just 200 m from the hotel and Termini train station is approximately 1 km away. Leonardo da Vinci International (Fiumicino) airport is around 16 km from the design hotel and Ciampino airport is roughly 32 km away.

This intimate, luxurious residential townhouse provides 5 quiet and exclusive accommodation units, comprising 3 suites and 2 king-size double rooms. Facilities available to guests at the air-conditioned hotel include a lobby with a 24-hour check-out service, a hotel safe and room service.

Each room is equipped with an en suite bathroom with a bathtub and hairdryer, a double bed with linen sheets, a video telephone, Internet access, a mini fridge, safe and flat-screen cable TV. Guests may also relax on their private balcony or terrace.

Sun loungers are provided at the hotel.

In the warmer months breakfast is served in the garden, amidst banana trees and bamboo.

Located in the Valle di Non, Agritur de Poda is surrounded by fruit trees and views of the Brenta Alps. It offers free Wi-Fi and spacious apartments.

Accommodation at the Poda includes a balcony and a fully fitted kitchen. A restaurant offering discounts to the Podas guests, together with a supermarket, are a 5-minute walk away.

The Poda Agriturismo is 15 km from Lake Tovel. The Andalò ski slopes are 25 km away. Please inform Agritur de Poda Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Happy Moments Resort Hotel has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Lauria. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. At Happy Moments Resort Hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Description:
Right next to the Piz La Ila ski lift connecting to the Dolomiti Superski and Sellaronda ski areas, Wellness Hotel Gran Risa offers Alpine-style accommodation in La Villa. It features a wellness centre and traditional restaurant.

Rooms at Gran Risa are fitted with light-wood furnishings and carpeted floors, in a traditional mountain style. Facilities include a balcony overlooking the mountains, as well as an LCD TV with satellite channels.

Guests can spend relaxing moment on the furnished terrace or at the free spa, where 3 saunas and indoor pool are available.

Meat specialities and traditional polenta are served at the propertys restaurant, specialising in both local and italian cuisine.

The property is in the heart of the mountains, 5 minutes drive from Badia. Brunico is a 30-minute drive away. Massages and use of the solarium come at extra costs.

Located in San Pedro Cholula, Real de Ariza is within a 5-minute drive of Cruz del Sur Shopping Center and Ice Arena Puebla.  This bed & breakfast is 11 mi (17.7 km) from Val´Quirico and 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from FINSA.
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a television in a common area.
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.
Grab a bite from the snack bar/deli, or stay in and take advantage of the bed & breakfast's room service (during limited hours). Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to noon for a fee.
Make yourself at home in one of the 6 guestrooms featuring espresso makers and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.

HotelName: Suites Casa Mateo San Miguel A
Address: Calzada De La Aurora 53 Edificio D-2 PB
Description:
Featuring garden views, Suites Casa Mateo San Miguel Allende in San Miguel de Allende features accommodation, an outdoor swimming pool, a garden, a shared lounge, a terrace and a tennis court. Free WiFi is available.

The apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and shower. Some units also have a kitchen equipped with a fridge, an oven, and a microwave.

Popular points of interest near Suites Casa Mateo San Miguel Allende include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Church of St. Michael the Archangel and Public library. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 73 km from the accommodation. Please inform Suites Casa Mateo San Miguel Allende in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
A damage deposit of MXN 2000 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out.

Address: Albatros SN 63732 La Cruz de Huanacaxtle
Description:
Just 600 metres from La Cruz de Huanacaxtle Beach, Destino La Joya offers an outdoor pool, hot tub and gym. Apartments features furnished terraces overlooking La Cruz Harbour and Banderas Bay.

Destino La Joyas stylish 2-bedroom apartments include a living-dining area with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, bed linen and towels are provided.

You can find bars, restaurants and grocery stores within a 10-minute walk, in the charming town of La Cruz de Huanacaxtle. Destino La Joya can also arrange grocery deliveries on request.

Destino La Joya is a gated communited with 24-hour security and free underground parking. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is within a 20-minute drive, while central Puerto Vallarta is a 25-minute drive away.

Description:
The family-run Hotel Fenix is just 1 block from Tapachulas Central Park. It offers 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and free parking. All rooms have air conditioning and cable TV.

Featuring tiled floors, each room has a safe, a desk and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower and toiletries.

The hotel has a bar and restaurant. Room service is available and there are vending machines for drinks and snacks.

Luggage storage and a laundry service are offered at the Hotel Fenix. You can also exchange currency. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

 The property will deny access to the reservation if the guest does not provide a photo identification that matches with the credit card upon check-in.

Address: Ave Rueda Medina 491 B 77400 Isla Mujeres
Description:
Located in Isla Mujeres, 1.5 km from Paraiso Beach, El Milagro Beach Hotel and Marina provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms.

At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

El Milagro Beach Hotel and Marina offers a barbecue. You can play table tennis and darts at the accommodation, and the area is popular for snorkelling and cycling.

Cancun Underwater Museum is 5 km from El Milagro Beach Hotel and Marina, while National park El Garraf?n is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Canc?n International Airport, 27 km from the hotel.

Description:
Puerta Cortes is a 220 HA Resort, one of the most renowned communities on the Sea of Cortez.
Enjoy this amenity filled paradise just 7 mins away from La Paz Malecon. Puerta Cortes and Puerta Cortes Residences is the official Vacation Rental Program, The Only Way To Enjoy a True Resort Experience!

Daily Cleaning is included in your fare!
Puerta Cortes Residences: Las Colinas are located within its own residential complex, 2 fun minutes away in your included golf cart from the Blue Cortes Beach Club and the Pueblito Marinero Marina Village surrounding the beautiful Costa Baja Marina.
Enjoy the private pool of Las Colinas or go to the Blue Cortes Beach Club. All the units have a terrace, private bathroom, and a seating area.

Our Marina Village hosts restaurants offering room-service, mini-mart, health center, tour operators, and a coffee shop. The Blue Cortes Beach Club has its infinity pool and top restaurant and bar, enjoy a day of total relaxation. (Exclusive access included only through the official Puerta Cortes Vacation Rental Program).

Enjoy El Cortes Golf Club, Mexicos only 18 hole Gary Player Signature Golf Club, Tennis Courts, Fitness Center, and Spa. This 5-star resort includes free WiFi, daily cleaning exclusive access to all Puerta Cortes amenities (Golf and Spa additional fees apply).
Our concierge will be happy to assist you with booking private or public tours to the endless activities within and around the resort.

Enjoy breakfast and lunch at Blue Cortes Beach Club, Cardon at El Cortes Golf Club or DoceCuarenta Coffee Shop in the Marina Village. For Lunch and dinner Puerta Cortes has 3 restaurants in the Marina Village, Japanese food Odayaka, International Cuisine at Azul Marino, or Italian at la Barcaccia.

If you are looking for a more private pool, Las Colinas has its own outdoor pool.
Manuel Marquez de Leon International Airport is 17.7 kms. (11 Miles) from the property and San Jose del Cabo Airport is 170 Kms. (105 Miles) through a 4 lane concrete highway.
Check-in is to be made in the Marina Towns Official Puerta Cortes Reception

We speak English and Spanish. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Casa Bahia Bonita is located right on the beach in the secluded tropical destination of Yelapa. It offers oceanfront studios, tropical gardens and an on-site tour desk.

Each studio at this property features a kitchenette with a fridge, stove and kitchenware. They also include a wardrobe, a fan and private balcony.

At Casa Bahia Bonita you will find a shared terrace, and guests can reach restaurants within a short 5-minute walk.

The tour desk can help arrange outings to local sights, with the beautiful Islas Marietas islands reachable in 40 minutes by boat.

Licenciado Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport in neighbouring Puerto Vallarta is 50 minutes away by boat. Please inform Casa Bahia Bonita in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
A damage deposit of MXN 600 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
Situated just 5 minutes from the centre of Cuernavaca, the hotel is approximately 15 minutes from Jiutepec and about 25 minutes from the town of Tepoztlan.

The modern hotel comprises 2 floors with a total of 11 rooms. Guests have access to the hotel terrace and gardens over which the hotel restaurant affords wonderful views. The Galería bar is located in the hotel lounge and provides a range of special drinks and a relaxed ambience. Further in-house features include an art gallery, a safe, work areas, a banquet service, medical assistance and room and laundry services. Car parking is available to those arriving by car.

Each of the rooms comes with a king-sized or a double bed, an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer, satellite/ cable TV, a direct dial telephone, a radio, a hire safe and a balcony or terrace.

There is a swimming pool to make use of the outdoor area. Guests may enjoy a therapeutic massage.

Breakfast may be selected from an ample buffet; it is possible to book a bed and breakfast only stay.

Description:
This spacious, Mexican-style house is located near the lush alpine forest outside of Mazamitla and comes with garden views and on-site parking. The city centre is just 650 metres away from Lomas Verdes 53.

This Two-Bedroom House comes with rustic décor, a large outdoor terrace, a comfortable seating area and a fully equipped kitchen. There is also a TV and a dining area.

Downtown Mazamitla offers a range of dining options, including a restaurant serving traditional cuisine within 550 metres. Guests can also use the propertys BBQ facilities.

There is a small artisanal market just a 4-minute walk away, and Los Cazos waterfalls are a 5-minute drive away. There is an eco-tourism park located within a 20-minute drive from the property.

Lomas Verdes 53 is 143 km from Guadalajaras International Airport. A deposit for 50% of the total amount of the reservation via bank transfer is required at least 48 hours before arrival. Lomas Verdes 53 will contact you with instructions after booking.

Please note that Lomas Verdes has several locations. You can check-in at the address stated in the booking confirmation.

Address: LAZARO CARDENAS ESQUINA BORDO CABO SAN LUCAS
Description:
The hotel is situated just outside the main entrance of the town of Cabo San Lucas, with easy access to the international airport.

This hotel differentiates itself from traditional hotels with its beautiful design styles and a total of 32 suites, situated around a relaxing pool and next to the Palapa bar and restaurant. Facilities include a lobby, hotel safe, WLAN Internet access and a car park.

The condo-suites have an area of 40 m², which comprises a dining room with fully equipped kitchen, an en suite bathroom and a private bedroom. The kitchen has a large fridge, microwave, blender, toaster and a coffee machine. Other in-room amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, Internet access and individually regulated air conditioning.

Guests may take a dip in the outdoor swimming pool.

Description:
Located in Río Verde, OYO Hotelito Inn features a bar. Featuring a restaurant, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom.

At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe. All units at OYO Hotelito Inn are equipped with a TV with cable channels.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.

The holiday home is composed of 7 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home.

Cabanas Cultural Institute is 4.4 km from the holiday home, while Guadalajara Cathedral is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 22 km from Mega Cool Home Hasta Para 16 Personas. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Facing the beachfront, Hotel Casa Takywara offers 4-star accommodation in Holbox Island and features a terrace and private beach area. Featuring a garden, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

The units at the hotel come with a seating area. All rooms come with a coffee machine, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have sea views. At Hotel Casa Takywara each room includes bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Playa Holbox is a few steps from Hotel Casa Takywara, while Punta Coco is 1.8 km away. Please inform Hotel Casa Takywara in advance of your expected arrival time. Once a booking has been made, the hotel will contact the guest directly to arrange payment by bank transfer or PayPal.The payment fees of PayPal and banks are not included. For bookings of 1 night, the full amount must be paid in advance.

There are no banks or cash machines on Holbox Island. Please ensure that you have enough cash for the duration of your stay.

Please note that bicycle rental and transfers from Cancun Airport can be arranged at an extra cost. These services must be requested in advance, by emailing the contact email address found on the booking confirmation.

Description: Los Arcos is a hotel in La Paz, a city whose character continues to reflect its name "The Peace". The hotel offers charm and grace combined with a colonial feel. Choose among a variety of accommodations that will suit every taste: from hotel rooms and suites with a colonial decoration with garden or ocean view to thatched-roofed rustic bungalows, all of them very comfortable and featuring air-conditioning. Just two blocks south of downtown, on the seawalk, Los Arcos is steps from the bay and connects you to all that is La Paz. This distinctive resort hotel is the perfect oasis for those who long to explore the natural wonders of the Sea of Cortez or wish to experience the legendary sport fishing of La Paz.
HotelFacilities: Restaurant Room service Jacuzzi Bar Sauna

Each air-conditioned apartment and studio at Cabo Paraiso Condos and Studios has simple, modern décor. There is a sofa, satellite TV and either a kitchen or a kitchenette.

Shops, bars and restaurants can be found in the centre of Cabo San Lucas and around the marina. The hotel features a poolside bar and a terrace.

There are 3 golf courses with 15 minutes drive of the Cabo Paraiso, while Cabo Pulmo National Park is 75 km away. Los Cabos International Airport can be reached in 40 minutes by car. Upon check-in photo identification and credit card is required. All special requests are subject to availability upon check-in. Special requests cannot be guaranteed and may incur additional charges.

Please note that if guests require of a late check-in (after 17:00), they have to contact Cabo Paraíso Condo in advance.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Nestled in the hills of upscale Westchester County, the Comfort Inn & Suites hotel is located in the historic Hudson Valley, just minutes from Marymount College and Pace University. Visitors of this Hawthorne, NY hotel can enjoy outlet and mall shopping at the nearby Palisades Center and The Westchester mall.

The Phillipsburg Manor, once the headquarters of an enormous Hudson Valley manor, is just five miles away. Westchester Community College and the Westchester Medical Center are minutes away. Many upscale industrial parks, business complexes and corporations, including IBM and Minolta, are also close to the hotel. Several specialty and chain restaurants are adjacent to the hotel, including Applebees Neighborhood Grill & Bar, the Executive Diner, Tinos, Tramontos and several fast food restaurants.

This Hawthorne, NY hotel offers many amenities, like free weekday newspaper, free local calls and an indoor pool. Enjoy our free hot breakfast featuring eggs, meat, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and more, including your choice of hot waffle flavors!

Guests are invited to take advantage of the exercise room and indoor pool. Business travelers can appreciate conveniences like spacious work areas, high-speed Internet access and the business center. The meeting rooms accommodate up to 60 people for business events.

All guest rooms of this New York hotel are equipped with hair dryers, irons, ironing boards, microwaves, refrigerators, Nintendo game systems and cable television with free HBO, CNN and ESPN. One- and two-bedroom suites, as well as whirlpool suites, are available and perfect for extended stay guests.

Coin-operated laundry facilities are on the premises for guest convenience. Daily, weekly and monthly rate plans are offered. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

The rental agreement must be signed and returned directly to the property within 48 hours. 

A refundable security deposit is required for all bookings. This will be collect after the booking is completed directly from the professional property manager. Pets and smoking are not allowed. Failure to observe these rules will result in a minimum $250 charge against your security deposit. 

RVs, campers, and trailers are not allowed in the driveway of the rental or the grounds of the development. 

Guests must be 25 years or older to check in without a parent or official guardian.

Description:
HeadLine : In Orlando (Florida Center)

Location : With a stay at Wingate by Wyndham Convention Ctr Closest Universal Orlando in Orlando (Florida Center), you ll be within a 5-minute drive of Universal Orlando Resort and Orlando International Premium Outlets. This hotel is 1.3 mi (2.1 km) from Universal Studios Florida and 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from The Wizarding World of Harry Potter.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 43-inch LED televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary weekday newspapers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Dining : A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM.

Address: 1842 Main Street Historic Route 7A Manchester CenterVermont 05255
Description:
Set in Manchester, The INN at Ormsby Hill offers accommodation with a balcony or a patio, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a garden and a shared lounge. The accommodation is air conditioned and comes with a spa bath.

There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with free toiletries, a hairdryer and bathrobes.

The bed and breakfast offers an American or gluten-free breakfast.

The INN at Ormsby Hill offers a hot tub.

A terrace is available on site and both skiing and cycling can be enjoyed within close proximity of the accommodation.

Stratton Mountain is 30 km from The INN at Ormsby Hill, while Bennington Battle Monument is 40 km away. The nearest airport is Rutland State Airport, 49 km from the bed and breakfast. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
